× Please note that only the following sectors are supported in this PoC version of BIDi 1. Water 2. Transportation 3. Energy Also note that the current PoC version of BIDi only answers specific questions about Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) in the supported sectors Sample Questions are: 1. I am looking for person who worked in water projects in Brazil 2. I am looking for some SME from Bolivia 3. Give me list of SME from Energy Sector 4. Can you help me to find SME in energy sector from Mexico? 5. Transport sector in Peru
